animeDescription: Get data for any anime on AniList.
animeError: An error occurred while trying to find the anime. Try again or contact the developer by joining [the support server](<https://join.skyra.pw>)
animeQueryFail: I am sorry, but that query failed. Are you sure `{{search}}` is actually an anime?
mangaDescription: Get data for any manga on AniList.
mangaError: An error occurred while trying to find the manga. Try again or contact the developer by joining [the support server](<https://join.skyra.pw>)
mangaQueryFail: I am sorry, but that query failed. Are you sure `{{search}}` is actually an manga?
queryOnlyNsfw: I am sorry, but {{search}} only returned NSFW results which are not allowed here. Why don't you try searching that in an NSFW channel?
